resources.string: Thai Federation on Logistics has been operate the Happy Workplace scheme which supported by Thai Health Promotion Foundation under a project name “New dimensional of happy workplace to increase wellbeing for land logistics staffs”.

As a result, we create an ASEAN language translation application for logistics industry which consist of 10 ASEAN Languages plus Chinese. This application will be useful for logistics’ staffs and entrepreneurs who need to develop working skills and abilities. In order to, be more efficiency and prepared for the opening of ASEAN Economic Community (AEC).
